00020 #include "rmapimagediffpoints.h"

00022 namespace RDK2 { namespace RMaps {
00023 
00024 RDK2_FACTORY(RMapImageDiffPoints);
00025 
00026 
00027 RMapImageDiffPoints::RMapImageDiffPoints(RMapImage* mapImage, const vector<Point2i>& points) :
00028     ObjectDiff("RMapImage"),
00029     refMapImageX(mapImage->x), refMapImageY(mapImage->y), refMapImageTheta(mapImage->theta),
00030     refMapImageRealWidth(mapImage->realWidth), imageDiffPoints(0)
00031 {
00032     imageDiffPoints = new RImageDiffPoints(mapImage->image, points);
00033 }
00034 
00035 RMapImageDiffPoints::RMapImageDiffPoints() :
00036     ObjectDiff("RMapImage"),
00037     refMapImageX(0.), refMapImageY(0.), refMapImageTheta(0.), refMapImageRealWidth(0.), imageDiffPoints(0)
00038 { }
00039 
00040 RDK2::Object* RMapImageDiffPoints::clone() const
00041 {
00042     RMapImageDiffPoints* r = new RMapImageDiffPoints(*this);
00043     r->imageDiffPoints = imageDiffPoints ? (RImageDiffPoints*) imageDiffPoints->clone() : 0;
00044     return r;
00045 }

00060 
00061 vector<ObjectDiff*> RMapImageDiffPoints::split(size_t maxSize)
00062 {
00063     vector<ObjectDiff*> ret;
00064     vector<ObjectDiff*> v = imageDiffPoints->split(maxSize);
00065     for (size_t i = 0; i < v.size(); i++) {
00066         RMapImageDiffPoints* curDiff = new RMapImageDiffPoints(*this);
00067         curDiff->imageDiffPoints = dynamic_cast<RImageDiffPoints*>(v[i]);
00068         ret.push_back(curDiff);
00069     }
00070     return ret;
00071 }
